_header: If any man ask a question of thee

PierpontAcc53095.Transcription:
Yff anye man aske a question of theIn thine answer makeng be nott to
                    hastyeEles may he joudge in the little wytteTo aunswer to a thynge and
                    nott heare ytt
PierpontAcc53095.Note:
In a copy of 
            The Greate Herball, J. Kynge, 1561 . Added by a hand of the sixteenth
                    century.
